EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmed for BendixKing webinar May 1, 2019
EmailTemplate.textOnly: <[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]> Thank you for your registration on “Alternative Methods of Investment in Your Avionics”. We will send you the webinar link and dial-in information the week of April 22nd, 2019. If you have any questions, please contact Robert Haim at robert.haim@bendixking.com <[[mailto:robert.haim@bendixking.com?subject=Webinar | Alternative Methods of Investment in Your Avionics]]>.
